summary: REQ-1 appears implemented in frontend/index.html (verithos.com removed; canonical/og:url set to https://verithos.io/; og:image and favicon use relative /assets/...; dns-prefetch uses verithos.io and www.verithos.io). However, the diff also includes substantial unrelated frontend component/style/hook changes that go beyond the requested metadata/URL-only scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple unrelated frontend feature/UI changes (routing/CTA rendering, new menu item, admin/request modals logic changes, file upload behavior changes, styling updates, etc.) beyond static <head> metadata adjustments.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints limit changes to metadata/URL adjustments to remove verithos.com usage and apply verithos.io fallback; these changes alter application behavior and UI.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for frontend/src/App.tsx, frontend/src/components/MobileMenu.tsx, frontend/src/components/OfficialProfileRequestModal.tsx, frontend/src/index.css, frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts, frontend/src/pages/AdminOfficialProfileRequestsPage.tsx, frontend/src/components/OfficialResponseModal.tsx, frontend/src/pages/CompanyPage.tsx, frontend/src/components/ReviewSubmissionModal.tsx, frontend/src/blob-storage/FileStorage.ts, etc.)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking/state metadata unrelated to implementing the requested head-tag URL changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request modifications to project_state.json; it only requests static <head> metadata updates in frontend/index.html.
